review.description: I went to the dec 20 630 show for lala land  The screen is huge and the theatre is set up nothing can block you view seats are set up so theres 2 seats per table the tables are nice size  The staff is very friendly as is happy to explain to you how to order you sit down and fillout a piece of paper and put it in a slot since the paper is white it can be seen in the dark there are lights under the seats so the server stoop down to deliver your order there is one server per row  Food ranges from flatbreads to salads to burger and fries there is also a full service bar  The cokes are bottomless as is the popcorn  I order the mozzarella flatbread that was a nice size portion baked to crisp perfection  My husband had the brisket burger which came with fries  He loved it.  The cookies we got for desert were more like cake freshly baked.  They adhere to a policy of no talking to make up for the noise of the food I was cheering after each musical number so I was given a warning  They warn you once and if they have to warn you again you will be thrown out without a refund Consider yourself warned Great place for birthdays prices of food are reasonable
review.author: Stacey A.
